children.text: Finely crafted components built with React, Tailwind and Shadcn UI. Developers can copy and paste these blocks directly into their project.
Click around, make changes and see test out the full power of payblocks for yourself. You can visit the admin dashboard and get auto-logged in as editor.
I'm really satisfied with this template. It saved us hours of work!
